Gameplay

Players take turns playing a single card onto the play deck. A valid play consists of:
- matching suit
- matching rank (number)
- an 8

If an 8 is played, a suit is chosen which the next player must play. An 8 is always a valid play.

If there is no valid play, cards are drawn until a valid play becomes available.

Cards may be drawn at any time, even if a valid play is available.

Winning

The first player to empty their hand wins!
